scripts.compose: npx wgc@latest router compose -i graph.yaml -o config.json
scripts.build: npx wgc@latest router plugin build plugins/users --debug && npm run compose
scripts.test: npx wgc@latest router plugin test plugins/users
scripts.generate: npx wgc@latest router plugin build plugins/users --generate-only
scripts.postinstall: npx wgc@latest router download-binary -o release && chmod +x release/router
